title: How do I change the keyboard letter associated with opening a link in a new window on right click?
content: I noticed in the last firefox update, when you right click on a link, the letter associated with opening a link in a new window has changed from W to D. Is there any way to change this back easily? Honestly, I can probably get used to it but it's just an annoying change, and a curiously illogical one. There's nothing else that uses that particular letter in the standard right-click menu so the change seems bizarre.
creator: arb.clarke

title: white start up screen of Firefox
content: Firefox starts now with a total white screen for about 30sec before it starts loading my homepageÂ ! and do not get why it is suddenly . It started after windows update what i straight away had to to disable cause of taskbar bug
creator: Wilhelmus

title: firefox won't load pages, get code 0xc00000ba application cannot start
content: I have a new asus laptop. Firefox worked ok when I first set it up. But a couple days later, it would open but would notload any web pages. It would open in settings and other topics on the menu but no pages. At first I got the roor code vcruntime140_1.dll. I did the steps to fix that. I have run scandisk and chkdsk and any other solution suggested. Nothing has fixed it. It runs fine on my desktop pc. When I download it, I get the 0xc00000ba code and application cannot start.
creator: jmartin_

title: Amazon Videos
content: With this new update Amazon videos open as an overlay over the current page
creator: RobN1
